name: Bookmark
description:
Free bookmark with every t-shirt and bag
buy. One size fits all. Personalize and
add your name to the field provided for
names- for a custom fit.

Remember Japan and Remember to Love
wherever you go and whenever be it so.

100% recycled card stock. 350gsm. Offset.
Vegetable based inks.

Images - Cricket Ink. © KRIZAN (2) / Typeselected. 2012

name: Print One
description:
TP-001 / Remember Japan Set.

1yr Anniversary. Earthquake/Tsunami (11/03/11)
Limited Edition of 3.
100% of proceeds go to CRASH Japan.
_______________________________________________

Giclée Fine Art Print - 610mm x 400mm
100% Cotton Rag. 315 gsm. Smooth Matte Paper.
Archival Museum Grade Quality.
_______________________________________________

100% committment to using only locally sourced workmanship, sustainable practices and environmentally friendly materials throughout every stage of the process - from seed to sold.
_______________________________________________

© KRIZAN (2) /  Typeselected. 2012

name: Tee One
description:
TT-001 / Remember Japan Set.


1yr Anniversary. Earthquake/Tsunami (11/03/11)
Limited Edition of 100
100% of proceeds go to CRASH Japan

_______________________________________________


American Apparel 100% Organic Cotton Unisex T-shirt. 
Hand Screen Print. Waterbased Ink
Custom Packaging. 100% Recycled. Compostable
Free Bookmark. 100% Recycled. Offset. Vegetable Based Inks

_______________________________________________


100% committment to using only locally sourced workmanship, sustainable practices and environmentally friendly materials throughout every stage of the process - from seed to sold.

_______________________________________________


PN - Unisex fit is closer to Men's size specs. Style works well as oversized silhouette. Men : order one size up for the O/S look.* PPN - There is a chance fine traces of coloured yarn may be scantly found within the fabric of some tees. An inherent trait of this AA base. This is a random element, therefore each tee is individual and possibly unique in itself. 

_______________________________________________


Images - Cricket Ink. © KRIZAN (2) / Typeselected. 2012
